Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Ronald Bower
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Ronald Bower, provided he files an application with the head of the NYSLRS within one year.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Ronald Bower
